title: Display of Gender Distribution by Class
question_text:
The following graph displays the frequency distribution of gender by class level at a small private high school.
Which of the following statements is NOT supported by the graph?

choices.text: The freshman class has about the same number of boys and girls.
The sophomore class is the only class containing more girls than boys.

Girls represent about
25
%
of the junior class.
The senior class has the most students of any class at this school.
Overall there are approximately the same number of girls and boys at this school.
